fields_of_interest: Culture and media, Consumers, Culture, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Digital economy and society, Communication
eu_initiatives: Ensuring proportion privacy proposals, maintaining freedom of expression and strong media plurality frameworks to ensure a diverse, unfettered availability of news across member states, and challenging existing and emerging monopolies in the media.
